run_cmd.description: Executes a shell command on the system for automation and scripting. Use 'sudo' only when necessary and explicitly mention when used.

turn_on_camera.description: Enables the system camera, making it available for use.

turn_off_camera.description: Disables the system camera, preventing it from being accessed.

open_site.description: Opens a specified website in the system's default web browser. If the URL is a search query, ensure it follows the correct format. For YouTube searches, use 'https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=<query>', replacing spaces with '+'.

parameters.url: The full URL of the website to open (string). Example: 'https://example.com' or 'https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=phineas+and+ferb'.
